TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoggerDescription extends System.Object

summary.span: 以值集合的形式包含有关记录器的信息，这些信息可用于实例化记录器，还可经序列化以在不同进程之间传递。

span.span: Contains information about a logger as a collection of values that can be used to instantiate the logger as well as being serialized to pass between different processes.

span.span: The class name for the logger.
The assembly name for the logger.

summary.span: 基于给定的参数创建记录器说明。

span.span: Creates a logger description based on the given parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 记录器名称通过组合其类名称和程序集名称生成。The logger name is generated by combining its class name and assembly name.
